resources.string: Have you ever kept your phone in silent mode and forgot where it is, and you dont have Internet turned On?? Then this is the best app for you.

Store a backup phone number and select different features which you want to control remotely. So whenever you want to toggle your wifi or forgot where you have kept your phone, Just give a missed call from the backup number stored. The Phone will start ringing even if it is in silent mode or toggles your phone Wifi, so that you can search it using Google device manager.
\u2022 Switch to General mode without ringing Phone.
Need Permission for app to work properly.
In order for app to work properly it has to be allowed to run in background.

Open Oppo Security Center app.
Select Permissions Management.
Select Auto-run management. 
Auto Run Management.
Whitelist Smartify.

Open Settings.
Select Power Manager.
Select Background app.
Allow Smartify to run in background.
Swipe down to open quick settings.\nOpen Auto-Start Manager from the app.\nAllow Smartify to run in background.

Open iManager application.
Click on App Manager.
Click on Auto start manager.
Select Smartify from the list.
